xmlText.p: MLB — Suspended Houston RHP Forrest Whitley (Double-A Corpus Christi) 50 games without pay for a violation of baseball's minor league drug prevention and treatment program.
TEXAS RANGERS — Acquired international slot compensation from Cincinnati for RHP Miguel Medrano.
PITTSBURGH PIRATES — Signed OF Michael Saunders to a minor league contract.
WASHINGTON NATIONALS — Agreed to terms with RHP Joaquin Benoit on a one-year contract. Placed RHP Joe Ross on the 60-day DL.
LINCOLN SALTDOGS — Signed LHP Jose Jose. Released RHPs Seth Webster, Evan Boyd and Jake Kuebler.
OTTAWA CHAMPIONS — Released INF Ricky Oropesa.
QUEBEC CAPITALES — Released OF Markus Knecht.
ROCKLAND BOULDERS — Signed RHP John LaRossa
INDIANA PACERS — Signed G Trey McKinney Jones to a 10-day contract.
LOS ANGELES SPARKS — Re-signed F Tiffany Jackson.
DELAWARE 87ERS — Acquired G Stefhon Hannah from the available player pool.
CAROLINA PANTHERS — Named Marty Hurney general manager.
EDMONTON ESKIMOS — Signed FB Christophe Normand and WR Rory Kohlert. Re-signed LB Jeremiah Kose.
ANAHEIM DUCKS — Recalled G Reto Berra from San Diego (AHL).
NEW YORK RANGERS — Assigned D Ryan Sproul to Hartford (AHL).
WASHINGTON CAPITALS — Acquired D Jakub Jerabek from Montreal for a 2019 fifth-round draft pick.
CS NORTHRIDGE — Named Jenny Ruiz-Williams women's assistant soccer coach.
